about_the_game:
Boring Man Premium lets you support your favorite developer, and gives you get some cool benefits as well. This DLC has a guarantee that it is NOT a "Pay to Win" buy, and anybody who owns this DLC will not gain an advantage in gameplay.

  • Hats! Over 30 hats to pick from! Customize your stick soldier with headgear adornments.
  • Colorful bullets! Wow your friends and enemies as you shower them with leaded death of a color of your choosing.
  • Colorful... blood? Change the hue of your fragile life essence!



  • Doublejump effects and colorful jetpack vapor are yours to control!
  • Get 2 new emotes to show off to your friends! Threaten your enemies with the /warcry and /letsgo emotes. Make them wet their pants in fear.

                   

  • Change the pitch of my.. I mean your voice when doing emotes!
  • Your username color in game and global chat can be customized!

content_descriptors.notes:
Boring Man - OTSC contains depictions of violence and "pixel blood". The characters in Boring Man can die in a variety of gruesome ways, but the pixel art keeps it silly.

Some features imply the inappropriate usage of drugs and alcohol, with little consequence. Boring Man - OTSC does not encourage the overuse of substances and entirely admits this is a controversial PR stunt.

detailed_description:
Boring Man Premium lets you support your favorite developer, and gives you get some cool benefits as well. This DLC has a guarantee that it is NOT a "Pay to Win" buy, and anybody who owns this DLC will not gain an advantage in gameplay.

  • Hats! Over 30 hats to pick from! Customize your stick soldier with headgear adornments.
  • Colorful bullets! Wow your friends and enemies as you shower them with leaded death of a color of your choosing.
  • Colorful... blood? Change the hue of your fragile life essence!



  • Doublejump effects and colorful jetpack vapor are yours to control!
  • Get 2 new emotes to show off to your friends! Threaten your enemies with the /warcry and /letsgo emotes. Make them wet their pants in fear.

                   

  • Change the pitch of my.. I mean your voice when doing emotes!
  • Your username color in game and global chat can be customized!

fullgame.name: Boring Man - Online Tactical Stickman Combat

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16+
  • Processor: ~2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

name: Boring Man: Premium!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: ~2.0GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Boring Man Premium is the advanced version of Boring Man that gives you extra, aesthetic features to the game. No pay to win here!
